mapper.select: SELECT F.FAQ_NUM, F.WRTNG_TITLE, F.WRTNG_DATE FROM (SELECT FAQ_NUM, WRTNG_TITLE, TO_CHAR(WRTNG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRTNG_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FAQ_NUM DESC) AS RNUM FROM FAQ)F WHERE F.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCount} AND #{endCount}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM FAQ WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ(FAQ_NUM, EMP_NUM, WRTNG_TITLE, WRTNG_CONT, WRTNG_DATE,CTGRY_NUM) VALUES(FAQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{emp_num}, #{title}, #{cont}, #{wrtng_date}, #{ctgry_num})
